mapper.select: select b.seq ,b.cdName ,b.cdUseNy ,b.cdTurn ,b.cdDesc ,b.delNy ,b.cdDateTime ,b.cdFixDate ,b.codegroup_seq ,a.seq ,a.cgName from code b join codegroup as a on a.seq = b.codegroup_seq order by b.seq desc

select b.seq ,b.cdName ,b.cdUseNy ,b.cdTurn ,b.cdDesc ,b.delNy ,b.cdDateTime ,b.cdFixDate ,b.codegroup_seq
from code b where 1=1 and b.seq = #{seq}
select a.seq as codegroup_seq ,a.cgName from codegroup a where 1=1 and a.delNy = 0 order by a.cgTurn Desc
